title: Victoria Silvstedt, 45, showcases her toned legs in leather miniskirt as she steps out in New York
text:
She has seen a hugely successful modelling career.

And Victoria Silvstedt, 45, showed off her effortless style credentials as she stepped out and about in New York City on Thursday.

The Swedish model showed off her envy-inducing legs in a tiny leather miniskirt as she strutted along in a pair of nude-coloured lace-up ankle boots.

Eyes on her; Victoria Silvstedt, 45, showed off her effortless style credentials as she stepped out and about in New York City on Thursday

Victoria teamed her flirty, ruffled skirt with a simple black top, and wrapped up in a chic camel-coloured coat.

The former pageant queen looked every inch the blonde bombshell thanks to her voluminous blowdry which complemented her youthful features.

With a shopping bag full of purchases, Victoria looked in her element as she continued on about her day.

Style: The Swedish model showed off her envy-inducing legs in a tiny leather miniskirt as she strutted along in a pair of nude-coloured lace-up ankle boots

Looking good: Victoria teamed her flirty, ruffled skirt with a simple black top, and wrapped up in a chic camel-coloured coat

Victoria has enjoyed a lengthy stint in the spotlight after being chosen to represent her country in the Miss World pageant in 1993.

After her pageant days, the Scandinavian stunner was spotted by Hugh Hefner and went on to become a Playboy Playmate.

Since her career rocketed, Victoria has modelled for some of the world's most prestigious fashion houses, including Chanel, Dior and Valentino.

Mane attraction: The former pageant queen looked every inch the blonde bombshell thanks to her voluminous blowdry which complemented her youthful features.

Despite the glamorous veneer to her lifestyle as a young model, she revealed there was a dark side in a recent interview with Female First.

Victoria said: 'I started very young to model in Paris when I was 18, I remember like starving myself to fit into the clothes and it was an amazing experience but you know I did shows for Valentino, Chanel, so it was really prestigious.

'But it never felt like it was my thing, I'm not like a runway skinny model, I'm more curvy. It was torture, I put myself through starvation, you know torturing myself.'
description: Victoria Silvstedt, 45, showed off her effortless style credentials as she stepped out and about in New York City on Thursday.
